description: Geospatial vector data format for GIS software. Developed / regulated by ESRI.
A comma-separated values (CSV) file is a delimited text file that uses a comma to separate values.
Excel binary file format for representing tabular data
Similar to XLS except it is  based on Microsoft Office Open XML format. Often used to represent larger tabular data
Portable Document Format. Created by Adobe. It can be used in multiple platforms.
Microsoft Word binary file format. Created for Windows, but can be also used in macOS.
Similar to DOC, but is more efficient and creates smaller, less corruptable files
Portable Network Graphic. A type of raster image file
Lossy compression format for digital images
A file format not listed in this controlled vocabulary
